SubModule_Description: The light module includes functions to change the color of the light on the SPIKE Prime hub.

Function.Function_Description: Change the color of a light on the hub.

Parameters.Argument_Description: A color from the color module

Python_Code.Python_Code:
from hub import light
import color

# Change the light to red 
light.color(light.POWER, color.RED)
Python_Code.Python_Description: Change the color of a light on the hub.
